Reply Funhouse123 January 6, 2017 at 6:41 am For anyone curious, you use your whatsapp on your mobile to scan the QR code for whatsapp web. Once you are far away from the computer or leave, the web app disconnects you from whatsapp and you would either have to have your phone within distance in a specific time frame, usually 1 minute, or if the phone is away for far too long you would have to reconnect by going back on the whatsapp on mobile and scanning the QR code again. In order to see if your whatsapp is connected in any other computer/laptop you just go to settings where the QR code is located and you can disconnect from any device. Either way, if you are spying on someone and they leave or disconnect you, you would have to start over again. Not that I spy, but I recommend immediately after connecting you download all conversations you can view in case you get disconnected and you need any sort of proof/information until you can get a hold of their phone again. There used to be apps where you could login into whatsapp with your phone number and password, but since whatsapp launched their web app many of them are gone.
